Interface JoystickListener

public interface JoystickListener

Listener for Joystick events. Copyright (C) 2009 Giacomo Ferrari

Method Detail

joystickMoved

void joystickMoved(boolean[] axesChanged,
                   JoystickState state,
                   java.lang.String source)
Called whenever a joystick's axis changes state.

Parameters:
axesChanged - Bitmap of axis status. If the nth value in this array is true, then the nth axis changed state.
state - The updated joystick state.

buttonChanged

void buttonChanged(boolean[] buttonsChanged,
                   JoystickState state,
                   java.lang.String source)
Called whenever a joystick's button changes state.

Parameters:
buttonsChanged - Bitmap of button status. If the nth value in this array is true, then the nth button changed state.
state - The updated joystick state.
